title: Join me on a journey
body:
Hi my name is Fitzky and I'm currently a bronze 4 League of Legends player. I am part of the rabble of shit you find clogged in your toilet drain after 3 days of bad diarrhea. Nevertheless, join me on an epic journey as we reach high, learn together, and climb the ranks to challenger where we will finally stand above the rest and say "We were once the shit you find clogged in your toilet, now we are the very shit that Faker himself blesses with his holy anus" WE WILL REIGN OVER OCE MY SHITTY FRIENDS TOGETHER WE CAN ACHIEVE GREATNESS JUST BELIEVE IN ME AND FAKERS ANUS

ADD ME IF YOU WANT TO JOIN MY GREAT AND GLORIUS JOURNEY

replies.body:
' sounds of owls and crickets ' 

Awks
